title: It's Time To Read
description: It's Time To ReadRain can't wait to have all his children's books on book shelves at every elementary schoolaround the globe.Its Rain dream to have school age students, to check out his books each week at the school library.It's Time To Read is a new line of children's book by kid author Rain Fields.He wants kids to read, every day for just 15 minutes or more.https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?...
author: Rain Fields
